Class Message

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommunicationMex, DecksUpdateMessage, DiscardResourceMessage, EndTurnMessage, ErrorMessage, FaithPathUpdateMessage, FirstActionMessage, HumanPlayerUpdateMessage, LeaderMessage, LobbyJoinMessage, LobbyMessage, LobbySetMessage, LoginMessage, MarketReplyMessage, MarketRequestMessage, MarketUpdateMessage, moveBetweenWarehouseMessage, Ping, ProductionMessage, SecondActionMessage, SetResourceMessage, ShiftWarehouseMessage, StateMessage
public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Generic message class. Every message class needs to extend this class.
